title: Three precious teares of blood, flowing from the wounded harts of three great French ladies In memory, of the vertues, complaint of the losse, and execration of the murther, of that thrice-worthy monarch, Henry the Great. Now shed againe in English. To three of the most excellent among the excellentest ladies of this little world, and of the greatest.
author: Loiseau de Tourval, Jean.
publisher: Printed [by W. Stansby] at Britaine Burse for Iohn Budge, and are there to be sold at his shop,
